attributes.action: scrap the tv licence(no more support for the bbc)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we have funded the bbc for long enough & for what?????repeats????we fund bbc digital channels that 1/2 the population cannot afford to have because of the tv licence cost!!!!!adverts are now quite humerous & i wouldnt mind them as per itv or channel 4 or 5.then there is the costs of wages for the people who torment non payers,the cost to send nonpayers to court,the costs to run the "detector vans" & dont forget the carbon footprint they leave behind!!!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
